Introduction
This topic contains information on adjusting an award from which VA is withholding compensation, including
retroactive adjustments that require special handling
adjusting an award based on a reduction in the combined disability rating
, and
status of a recoupment balance when VA stops paying compensation
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 2 - Recoupment of Separation Benefits
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section None
